skillsAndExperiences: Describing about my professional background and skill set
skills: I've worked as a mobile developer who works with the flutter framework and the darts programming language. As a hobby, I use C# to construct backend applications using the ASP.NET Core Web API. I have also worked with a number of front-end development frameworks, including React, TailwindCSS, and Boostrap.
experiences: I have developed a variety of mobile applications, beginning with an internship before becoming a mobile developer. I currently work as a mobile developer, team leader, and liaison between teams from various departments to create applications.
